function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Health issues persist with degraded IEQ in building types","Impact":"Negative impact on occupant health and well-being","Mitigation":"Improving indoor environmental quality (IEQ) through better ventilation, air filtration, and humidity control","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality sensors, smart building management systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, architects, engineers"},{"Description":"Lack of research on different building types and their impact on occupant health","Impact":"Limited understanding of how various building types affect occupant health","Mitigation":"Conducting more research on different building types and their impact on occupant health","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, environmental monitoring devices","People":"Building researchers, environmental scientists, building professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, building industry organizations"},{"Description":"Limited awareness and education among building professionals about the impact of their decisions on occupant health","Impact":"Potential for uninformed decisions that negatively affect occupant health","Mitigation":"Developing training programs, educational initiatives, and awareness campaigns for building professionals","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, educational modules, health impact assessment tools","People":"Building professionals, architects, engineers, facility managers","Owner":"Professional associations, educational institutions, industry organizations"}]}
